data.title: Linda Hoggatt Obituary 2014
data.meta_description: ARIZONA CITY - Linda Jo Hoggatt, 61, of Arizona City died on May 14, 2014, at home.Mrs. Hoggatt was born on March 26, 1953, in Durango, Colo., and was a daughter of John and Edi...
data.text:
ARIZONA CITY - Linda Jo Hoggatt, 61, of Arizona City died on May 14, 2014, at home.

Mrs. Hoggatt was born on March 26, 1953, in Durango, Colo., and was a daughter of John and Edith Barnes. She was a homemaker, was very loving and was devoted to her family, always giving of her time to others. She loved family gatherings and was fond of spending time with her children and nephews. She loved the Lord and kept him close to her heart, and she was a serious Dallas Cowboys fan and an animal lover.

Survivors include her husband, Albert; two daughters, Charlsie Hoggatt of Arizona City and Johonna "Jody" Hoggatt of Eloy; a son, Marvin Hoggatt of Arizona City; a brother, Jack Barnes of Ignacio, Colo.; and a grandchild.

J. Warren Funeral Services, Cole & Maud The Gardens Chapel was in charge of arrangements.
